acrg_cf_data_process_misc module¶

Data processing routines for various networks/stations

acrg_cf_data_process_misc.nies(fname, species, site, units='ppt')[source]¶
Examples of files that this will process:

fname = “/data/shared/obs_raw/NIES/HAT/HAT_20170804_PFC-318.xlsx” species = “PFC-318” site = “HAT”

fname = “/data/shared/obs_raw/NIES/HAT/HAT_20170628_CHCl3.txt” species = “CHCl3” site = “HAT”

acrg_cf_data_process_misc.obspack_co2(site, height, obspack_name)[source]¶

South African Weather Service observations

acrg_cf_data_process_misc.ucam(site, species)[source]¶

Process University of Cambridge data files

Inputs are site code and species

Assumes that file names start with a date, routine will pick the latest one
